sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STEPHEN VII . (February 929 to March 931) and STEPHEN VIII. (July 939 to October 942) were virtually nonentities, who held the pontificate during the so-called “ pornocracy ” of Theodora and Marozia (see Rome, vol. XX. p. 787-8).
